argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nv0id.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nv0id.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nv0id.6 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_0vfval | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( A G Z ) = ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G Z ) = ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_nvgrp | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran G |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_grporid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) = A ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) = A ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G Z ) = A ) |
